alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 26 at 4:08AM CDT until May 01 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Mississippi River at Burlington affecting Hancock, Henderson, Lee and Des Moines Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Mississippi River at Keithsburg affecting Henderson, Louisa, Mercer and Des Moines Counties. Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18 affecting Henderson and Des Moines Counties. For the Mississippi River...including Keithsburg, Gladstone LD18, Burlington...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:30 AM CDT Tuesday was 10.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued later this morning.
